languages.text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} forces an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} to immediately attack the Vanguard. All of the Vanguard's allies who are wielding melee weapons and adjacent to the enemy make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against that enemy. The enemy suffers +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} more damage from these attacks of opportunity and has a −{uip|DodgeParryPenalty|46e7a840c3d04703b154660efb45538b}% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.
languages.original_text: Заставляет находящегося рядом противника немедленно атаковать {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}авангарда{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}. Все союзники авангарда с рукопашным оружием на смежных клетках с этим оппонентом совершают против него {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}. Противник получает на {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} урона больше от этих атак, а также штраф −{uip|DodgeParryPenalty|46e7a840c3d04703b154660efb45538b}% к {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The Vanguard forces an enemy in their melee range to immediately attack the Vanguard. All of the Vanguard's allies who are wielding melee weapons and adjacent to the enemy make an attack of opportunity against the enemy. The enemy suffers +<u>(Vanguard's FEL bonus)</u> more damage from these attacks of opportunity and has a -<u>(10+2×(Vanguard's FEL bonus))%</u> penalty to parry and dodge.

The Vanguard forces an enemy in their melee range to immediately attack the Vanguard. All of the Vanguard's allies who are wielding melee weapons and adjacent to the enemy make an attack of opportunity against that enemy. The enemy suffers +<u>Vanguard's FEL bonus</u> more damage from these attacks of opportunity and has a −<u>(10 + 2 × Vanguard's FEL bonus)</u>% penalty to parry and dodge.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} forces an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} to immediately attack the Vanguard. All of the Vanguard's allies who are wielding melee weapons and adjacent to the enemy make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against that enemy. The enemy suffers +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} more damage from these attacks of opportunity and has a −{uip|DodgeParryPenalty|46e7a840c3d04703b154660efb45538b}% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

The Vanguard forces an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} to immediately attack the Vanguard. All of the Vanguard's allies who are wielding melee weapons and adjacent to the enemy make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attack of opportunity{/g} against that enemy. The enemy suffers +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} more damage from these attacks of opportunity and has a −{uip|DodgeParryPenalty|46e7a840c3d04703b154660efb45538b}% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g}.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} forces an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} to immediately attack the Vanguard. All of the Vanguard's allies who are wielding melee weapons and adjacent to the enemy make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against that enemy. The enemy suffers +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} more damage from these attacks of opportunity and has a −{uip|DodgeParryPenalty|46e7a840c3d04703b154660efb45538b}% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

languages.text: Заставляет находящегося рядом противника немедленно атаковать {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}авангарда{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}. Все союзники авангарда с рукопашным оружием на смежных клетках с этим оппонентом совершают против него {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}. Противник получает на {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} урона больше от этих атак, а также штраф −{uip|DodgeParryPenalty|46e7a840c3d04703b154660efb45538b}% к {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Vanguard forces an enemy in their melee range to immediately attack the Vanguard. All of the Vanguard's allies who are wielding melee weapons and adjacent to the enemy make an attack of opportunity against that enemy. The enemy suffers +<u>Vanguard's FEL bonus</u> more damage from these attacks of opportunity and has a −<u>(10 + 2 × Vanguard's FEL bonus)</u>% penalty to parry and dodge.

traits.locale_text: Заставляет находящегося рядом противника немедленно атаковать авангарда в ближнем бою. Все союзники авангарда с рукопашным оружием на смежных клетках с этим оппонентом совершают против него атаки по возможности. Противник получает на <u>бонус ОБЩ авангарда</u> урона больше от этих атак, а также штраф −<u>(10 + 2 × бонус ОБЩ авангарда)</u>% к парированию и уклонению.

Заставляет находящегося рядом противника немедленно атаковать авангарда в ближнем бою. Все союзники авангарда с рукопашным оружием на смежных клетках с этим оппонентом совершают против него атаки по возможности. Противник получает на <u>бонус ОБЩ авангарда</u> урона больше от этих атак, а также штраф −<u>(10 + 2 × бонус ОБЩ авангарда)</u>% к парированию и уклонению.

Заставляет находящегося рядом противника немедленно атаковать авангарда в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}. Все союзники авангарда с рукопашным оружием на смежных клетках с этим оппонентом совершают против него {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}атаки по возможности{/g}. Противник получает на <{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} урона больше от этих атак, а также {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −{uip|DodgeParryPenalty|46e7a840c3d04703b154660efb45538b}% к {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонению{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}先锋{/g}强迫{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战范围{/g}内的一名敌人立刻对先锋进行攻击。在此之后，先锋所有手持近战武器且与该名敌人相邻的盟友，都会立刻对该名敌人发动一次{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。借机攻击对该名敌人额外造成{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}点伤害，且该名敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}遭受{uip|DodgeParryPenalty|46e7a840c3d04703b154660efb45538b}%减值。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} forces an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} to immediately attack the Vanguard. All of the Vanguard's allies who are wielding melee weapons and adjacent to the enemy make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against that enemy. The enemy suffers +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} more damage from these attacks of opportunity and has a −{uip|DodgeParryPenalty|46e7a840c3d04703b154660efb45538b}% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 先锋强迫{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战范围{/g}内的一名敌人立刻对先锋进行攻击。在此之后，先锋所有手持近战武器且与该名敌人相邻的盟友，都会立刻对该名敌人发动一次{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}。借机攻击对该名敌人造成额外伤害，等同于<u>先锋的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>，且该名敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}遭受<u>（10+2×先锋的社交加值）</u>%{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}的减值{/g}。

先锋强迫{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战范围{/g}内的一名敌人立刻对先锋进行攻击。在此之后，先锋所有手持近战武器且与该名敌人相邻的盟友，都会立刻对该名敌人发动一次{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}。借机攻击对该名敌人造成额外伤害，等同于{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}，且该名敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}遭受{uip|DodgeParryPenalty|46e7a840c3d04703b154660efb45538b}%{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}的减值{/g}。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}先锋{/g}强迫{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战范围{/g}内的一名敌人立刻对先锋进行攻击。在此之后，先锋所有手持近战武器且与该名敌人相邻的盟友，都会立刻对该名敌人发动一次{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。借机攻击对该名敌人额外造成{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，且该名敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}遭受{uip|DodgeParryPenalty|46e7a840c3d04703b154660efb45538b}%{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。

languages.text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}vanguardia{/g} obliga a un enemigo situado dentro de su {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}alcance cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} a atacarle inmediatamente. Todos los aliados del vanguardia que empuñen armas de combate cuerpo a cuerpo y estén adyacentes al enemigo efectúan un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataque de oportunidad{/g} contra él. El enemigo sufre +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} más de daño de estos ataques de oportunidad y tiene una penalización de −{uip|DodgeParryPenalty|46e7a840c3d04703b154660efb45538b} % a su {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} forces an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} to immediately attack the Vanguard. All of the Vanguard's allies who are wielding melee weapons and adjacent to the enemy make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against that enemy. The enemy suffers +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} more damage from these attacks of opportunity and has a −{uip|DodgeParryPenalty|46e7a840c3d04703b154660efb45538b}% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}vanguardia{/g} obliga a un enemigo situado dentro de su {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}alcance cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} a atacarle inmediatamente. Todos los aliados del vanguardia que empuñen armas de combate cuerpo a cuerpo y estén adyacentes al enemigo efectúan un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataque de oportunidad{/g} contra él. El enemigo sufre +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} más de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de estos ataques de oportunidad y tiene una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −{uip|DodgeParryPenalty|46e7a840c3d04703b154660efb45538b} % a su {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g}.

El vanguardia obliga a un enemigo situado dentro de su {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}alcance cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} a atacarle inmediatamente. Todos los aliados del vanguardia que empuñen armas de combate cuerpo a cuerpo y estén adyacentes al enemigo efectúan un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}ataque de oportunidad{/g} contra él. El enemigo sufre +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} más de daño de estos ataques de oportunidad y tiene una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −{uip|DodgeParryPenalty|46e7a840c3d04703b154660efb45538b} % a su {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g}.

languages.text: Die {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vorhut{/g} zwingt einen Feind in ihrer {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfreichweite{/g}, die Vorhut sofort anzugreifen. Daraufhin führen sämtliche Verbündeten der Vorhut mit Nahkampfwaffen, die an den Feind angrenzen, einen {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriff{/g} gegen diesen Feind aus. Durch diese Gelegenheitsangriffe erleidet der Feind +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} mehr Schaden. Darüber hinaus erhält er einen Abzug von −{uip|DodgeParryPenalty|46e7a840c3d04703b154660efb45538b} % auf {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} forces an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} to immediately attack the Vanguard. All of the Vanguard's allies who are wielding melee weapons and adjacent to the enemy make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against that enemy. The enemy suffers +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} more damage from these attacks of opportunity and has a −{uip|DodgeParryPenalty|46e7a840c3d04703b154660efb45538b}% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Die {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vorhut{/g} zwingt einen Feind in ihrer {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfreichweite{/g}, die Vorhut sofort anzugreifen. Daraufhin führen sämtliche Verbündeten der Vorhut mit Nahkampfwaffen, die an den Feind angrenzen, einen {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriff{/g} gegen diesen Feind aus. Durch diese Gelegenheitsangriffe erleidet der Feind +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} mehr {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}. Darüber hinaus erhält er einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −{uip|DodgeParryPenalty|46e7a840c3d04703b154660efb45538b} % auf {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}.

Die Vorhut zwingt einen Feind in ihrer {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfreichweite{/g}, die Vorhut sofort anzugreifen. Daraufhin führen sämtliche Verbündeten der Vorhut mit Nahkampfwaffen, die an den Feind angrenzen, einen {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}Überraschungsangriff{/g} gegen diesen Feind aus. Durch diese Überraschungsangriffe erleidet der Feind +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} mehr Schaden. Darüber hinaus erhält er einen −{uip|DodgeParryPenalty|46e7a840c3d04703b154660efb45538b} %-{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g}.

languages.text: Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}patrouilleur{/g} contraint un ennemi situé {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}à portée de mêlée{/g} à l'attaquer sur-le-champ. Tous les alliés du patrouilleur qui manient des armes de mêlée et qui sont adjacents à cet ennemi lancent une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaque d'opportunité{/g} contre lui. Ces attaques d'opportunité infligent +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} points de dégâts supplémentaires à l'ennemi, et une pénalité de −{uip|DodgeParryPenalty|46e7a840c3d04703b154660efb45538b} % s'applique à sa {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} et à son {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} forces an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} to immediately attack the Vanguard. All of the Vanguard's allies who are wielding melee weapons and adjacent to the enemy make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against that enemy. The enemy suffers +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} more damage from these attacks of opportunity and has a −{uip|DodgeParryPenalty|46e7a840c3d04703b154660efb45538b}% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Le Patrouilleur contraint un ennemi situé à {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}portée de combat de mêlée{/g} à l'attaquer sur-le-champ. Tous les alliés du Patrouilleur qui manient des armes de mêlée et qui sont adjacents à cet ennemi lancent une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaque d'opportunité{/g} contre lui. Ces attaques d'opportunité infligent +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FRA{/g} du Patrouilleur</u> points de dégâts supplémentaires à l'ennemi, et une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -<u>(10 + 2 × bonus de FRA du Patrouilleur)</u> % s'applique à sa {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} et à son {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g}.

Le Patrouilleur contraint un ennemi situé à {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}portée de combat de mêlée{/g} à l'attaquer sur-le-champ. Tous les alliés du Patrouilleur qui manient des armes de mêlée et qui sont adjacents à cet ennemi lancent une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaque d'opportunité{/g} contre lui. Ces attaques d'opportunité infligent +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} points de dégâts supplémentaires à l'ennemi, et une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -{uip|DodgeParryPenalty|46e7a840c3d04703b154660efb45538b} % s'applique à sa {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} et à son {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}ヴァンガード{/g}はその{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接範囲{/g}にいる敵1体に、ヴァンガードへの攻撃を強制させる。近接武器を使用し、その敵に隣接するヴァンガードの味方はすべて、その敵に対して{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を行う。その敵はこの機会攻撃による被ダメージが+{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}分増加し、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}に−{uip|DodgeParryPenalty|46e7a840c3d04703b154660efb45538b}%のペナルティを受ける。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} forces an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} to immediately attack the Vanguard. All of the Vanguard's allies who are wielding melee weapons and adjacent to the enemy make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against that enemy. The enemy suffers +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} more damage from these attacks of opportunity and has a −{uip|DodgeParryPenalty|46e7a840c3d04703b154660efb45538b}% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

traits.locale_text: ヴァンガードはその{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接範囲{/g}にいる敵1体に、ヴァンガードへの攻撃を強制させる。近接武器を使用し、その敵に隣接するヴァンガードの味方はすべて、その敵に対して{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}機会攻撃{/g}を行う。その敵はこの機会攻撃による被ダメージが+<u>ヴァンガードの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}</u>分増加し、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}に−<u>(10 + 2 × ヴァンガードのFELボーナス)</u>%の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。

ヴァンガードはその{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接範囲{/g}にいる敵1体に、ヴァンガードへの攻撃を強制させる。近接武器を使用し、その敵に隣接するヴァンガードの味方はすべて、その敵に対して{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}機会攻撃{/g}を行う。その敵はこの機会攻撃による被ダメージが+{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}分増加し、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}に−{uip|DodgeParryPenalty|46e7a840c3d04703b154660efb45538b}%の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}ヴァンガード{/g}はその{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接範囲{/g}にいる敵1体に、ヴァンガードへの攻撃を強制させる。近接武器を使用し、その敵に隣接するヴァンガードの味方はすべて、その敵に対して{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を行う。その敵はこの機会攻撃による被{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}分増加し、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}に−{uip|DodgeParryPenalty|46e7a840c3d04703b154660efb45538b}%の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Öncü{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş menzili{/g} içinde bulunan bir düşmanı anında kendisine saldırmaya zorlar. Öncü'nün yakın dövüş silahı kullanan ve düşmanın bitişiğinde bulunan tüm dost birimleri, o düşmana karşı {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırısı{/g} gerçekleştirir. Düşman, bu fırsat saldırılarından +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} daha fazla hasara maruz kalır. Ayrıca {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} değerlerine −%{uip|DodgeParryPenalty|46e7a840c3d04703b154660efb45538b} ceza puanı alır.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} forces an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} to immediately attack the Vanguard. All of the Vanguard's allies who are wielding melee weapons and adjacent to the enemy make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against that enemy. The enemy suffers +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} more damage from these attacks of opportunity and has a −{uip|DodgeParryPenalty|46e7a840c3d04703b154660efb45538b}% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.
